dmca.title: RE: Trademark Infringement/ Unauthorized Use of the WAFFLE HOUSE Trademarks
dmca.body:
The information contained in this notification is accurate to the best of our knowledge.

WH Capital, L.L.C. ("WH Capital") owns the famous, and federally registered WAFFLE HOUSE trademark.  By this letter, WH Capital hereby provides notice that 2 Pimps And A Dream's song and music video entitled "Waffle House" posted on your "Blog of Sin" at http://www.byronsolomon.com/blog/ (the "Video") makes unauthorized use of WH Capital's WAFFLE HOUSE trademark in violation of state and federal law.

WH Capital demands that you permanently remove and disable further access to the Video within forty-eight (48) hours of your receipt of this notice.  WH Capital vigorously protects its trademarks and service marks from infringement and other abuses.  Please be advised that simultaneous with this demand, WH Capital is taking independent action against the musical group 2 Pimps And A Dream to address its unauthorized use of the WAFFLE HOUSE trademark in the Video.

Please contact me when the video has been removed from the website to confirm its removal and the permanent disabling of further access to the Video.  Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter, and we look forward to hearing from you.
